channel.title: Please help me hosting and a few lil things(still need help please!)
channel.description:
how do i host a server via hamachi? i have no clue. i got a 508 and i dont know where i add the ip and stuff. with a pic guide its well aprecated Also is there a way i can make my self a owner?? like if i hosted a server but i dont want credit for it. it just lets me have more options/commands cause i wana host it on my site. it will be free and everything. the server i use i will give 100% credit to the client/server creator, and what 508s do you suggest that are very good and up to date. thanks
Sorry for miss spelling

[quote=“jaydog0420, post:5, topic:302359”]i no but how do u make the server connect to hamachi[/quote] what do you mean? i have no Hamachi knowledge but i think that your network must be on, tell others your ip and pass, once they connect they will enter the ip on the client, and most likely they will login. Try it with a friend or something… I did! but i don’t use hamachi[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 14, 2009, 07:16:13 pm[/size][hr]whoops! you said what i said faster than me lolz

item.source: Please help me hosting and a few lil things(still need help please!)

item.title: Please help me hosting and a few lil things(still need help please!)
item.dc:creator: @zane02 zane02
item.description:
@zane02 wrote:

Just run the server and it will already be connected. But you have to be on the network and have hamachi running and use the ip hamachi gave you for the server ip.

  • have hamachi open
  • have the run-server on
  • have the person on the network
  • have the person use the ip hamachi gave you

then its connected to the server [also you have to be connected to hamachi too, for them to be able to be on]

Read full topic

item.title: Please help me hosting and a few lil things(still need help please!)
item.dc:creator: @zane02 zane02
item.description:
@zane02 wrote:

You tell them to download hamachi.
You make them join your network. [they need the name & pass]
You make them run a client
You make them use the hamachi ip [to log on the server]

then there in. Server must be on btw.

Read full topic

item.source: Please help me hosting and a few lil things(still need help please!)

item.title: Please help me hosting and a few lil things(still need help please!)
item.dc:creator: @zane02 zane02
item.description:
@zane02 wrote:

lol hamachi is simple to host with.

  1. download hamachi
  2. install hamachi
  3. start hamachi
  4. click create hamachi network
  5. tell people to download hamachi
  6. tell them the hamachi ip you were given
  7. tell them to load a client
  8. tell them to use your computer ip
  9. tell them make a username and password
  10. login

You have to create the network connection.
You have to run-server.

Read full topic
